global_caption: a scene featuring a man wearing a white short-sleeve shirt and beige pants, wearing sunglasses and holding a paper map in his right hand, staring to the left; a woman wearing a sky-blue dress, brown sandals, and holding a brown hat in her left hand, taking a picture of the sky with a camera; a female wearing a flower pattern top and short jeans, holding a coffee cup in her left hand and a gray suitcase in her right hand; and a man wearing a light green T-shirt, beige shorts, and black shoes, with his hands in his pockets and staring to the left.
